preference.name: MEWiPreviewFormat
preference.preference_description: Specifies the available file types for the format of the preview files created in the standard text editor and in the work instruction editor. Teamcenter creates a document of the file type specified by the first string. Valid Values: Accepts one of the following file formats supported by the Word Save As command: pdf mht docx rtf
